show_name: Watashi, Nouryoku wa Heikinchi de tte Itta yo ne!
other_title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
私、能力は平均値でって言ったよね!
opening_theme: "Smile Skill = Suki Skill! (スマイルスキル＝スキスキル！)" by Akaki Chikai (赤き誓い) (eps 2-4, 6-12)
ending_theme: "Genzai↑ Banzai↑ (ゲンザイ↑バンザイ↑)" by Mile (Azumi Waki)
